name: Demons of Grim Demo
description:
Prototype.

Controls:

ASWD or Arrows for movement (can use controller but not recommended).

Space Bar or Jump button for jumping.

Fire 1 or Left-Click: Spheroid weapon.

Fire 2 or Right-Click: Spellcasting (currently only one in demo)

Esc button to Open Pause Menu, can Continue, Return to Main Menu or Skip Story video (not recommended). From Main Menu can Quit Game.

Has bugs/inconsistencies. Story missing graphics, some at end though. Let me know if it was fun at least...May not be appropriate for younger children.
